name: raml-javascript-generator
description: Generate a JavaScript API client from RAML

scripts.test-spec: npm run test-server-open && ts-node node_modules/blue-tape/bin/blue-tape.js "src/**/*.spec.ts" | tap-spec; npm run test-server-close
scripts.test-cov: ts-node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover -e .ts --print none -x "*.d.ts" -x "*.spec.ts" blue-tape -- "src/**/*.spec.ts" | tap-spec
scripts.generate-client: node dist/bin.js test/support/fixtures/example.raml -o test/.tmp/example && cd test/.tmp/example && npm install
scripts.test-browser: browserify -i nock -t envify ./test/support/globals.js test/specs/*.js | tape-run --render tap-spec
scripts.test-server-close: if [ -f test.pid ]; then kill -9 $(cat test.pid); rm test.pid; fi
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run generate-client && npm run test-server-open && npm run test-cov && npm run test-browser; npm run test-server-close

author: MuleSoft, Inc.
